wallets.name: Identfy
wallets.description: Identfy is Spain's first open-source digital wallet solution developed by Izertis S.A. The solution features a two-wallet architecture (Holder Wallet mobile app and Organization Wallet for enterprises) enabling issuance, storage, and verification of verifiable credentials with Zero-Knowledge-Proof protocols for selective disclosure, biometric authentication, and DLT-based security, supporting use cases in healthcare, education, border control, and financial services across EU member states. Izertis actively participates in major EU digital identity projects including DC4EU consortium, EBSI-VECTOR project, and WE BUILD Large Scale Pilot.
